radiographic_examinations.findings: multiple cervical and dorsal discal hernia detected

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: improved findings after treatment with disappearance of lateral bowing of the femurs and tibias

radiographic_examinations.findings: intense degeneration on L5-S1 and S1-S2 and sclerosis on both sacroiliac joints, and lytic lesions observed
rotoscoliosis in thoracolumbar vertebrae, pars interarticularis defect at L2 level
